attributes.action: Actually start thinking of the person on the lowest income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it is wrong that the government always hits the average person with tax increases. They only think about themselves as they have the highest wages and do not have to worry about just making ends meet.The latest budget has just proven that with all the increases in tax on fuel and duty, This is guarented to have a knock-on affect with food in the shops and everything else. The tax increase to 20% even means more tax has to be paid on your wages as there is no 10% on the first amount earned. Surely this has to stop!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
